__e: You're the best actor in New York, with the hottest show, and you still got me.
The good thing is, finally, you acted like a human being instead of a cop.
Darn, Newt, he acted like you was his kin.
I had butterflies, but I acted like I'd done it all my life.
You were acting like everyone was dead. Your little brother has been terrified!
I never did anything against her but what right did she have to act like that?
If I always acted as you wanted me to, there would be no Kaji here today.
As long as it was all theory and no practice... I felt I was where I belonged.
I got scared and acted not very...
Unless the public learns why the Sanctuary residents did what they did, all those deaths will be for nothing.

No, Doctor, we have strong reason to believe that he already understands that he has acted in an indiscreet and hotheaded manner. It would be a far greater blow to him and his country than to us if this letter were to come out.
It was, in fact, my deepest wish and you figured it out also because, maybe, I acted in a way so that you could understand.
I got scared and acted not very...
I promise you, in a couple of days' time... ... you'llbeabletotell him you did the best job you could.
Unless the public learns why the Sanctuary residents did what they did, all those deaths will be for nothing.
My whole life I've done things for other people.
If you are a User, everything you've done is according to a plan.
I fear it is, and yet, methinks, it should not, for he hath still been tried a holy man.
They were looking after your best interests.
Your Honor, the police did everything properly.
You have been wronged in this life.
I said, we know you are not alone.
You see, I've always dodged around alone, because I figured a guy shaves a percentage against himself if he plays it alone.
- lf he did, he acted on his own.
She told me of her awful behavior to you.
You've been logical, done everything you could.
Well, you've all done very well today And acted with great restraint.
